mapper.select: select t.RESOURCE_ID,t.TYPE_NAME from comm_code_ssfl t where 1=1 and t.resource_id like '${type}%'
select t.RESOURCE_ID,t.AREA_NAME from comm_code_area t where t.RESOURCE_ID like '%0000'
select t.RESOURCE_ID,t.AREA_ABBR from comm_code_area t where LEFT(t.RESOURCE_ID,2) = SUBSTRING(#{sfid},1,2) AND RIGHT(t.RESOURCE_ID,2) = "00" AND SUBSTR(t.RESOURCE_ID,3,2)!="00"
select t.RESOURCE_ID,t.AREA_NAME from comm_code_area t where 1=1
